segments.text: Why did you buy that painting ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it's beautiful . I want to hang it in the living room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It looks like some kind of mistake .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's the beauty of it â€” the imperfection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your daughter . She sold it at the school auction .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ! How about we hang it over here where everyone can see it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess you see the value in it , too .
segments.speaker: S2
